select "author" , "title" , 'http://blog.agentzh.org/#post-' || "id" as link , "content" , "created_on" as published , 'http://blog.agentzh.org/#post-' || "id" || ':comments' as comments from "Post" order by "created_on" desc limit 20

content:
呵呵，我回来了！

我很开心哦，呵呵！
title: 我来了呀！
author: 章亦春
